name: Sun Wukong: Journey to the West
name_original: Sun Wukong: Journey to the West
description:
Sun Wukong and his friends are on a journey to the West, unfortunately they have been turned into spirits!

Sun Wukong must now travel across the land, avoiding obstacles and protect his friends from the evil spirit eaters. 

A mythical spin to the classic runner game.

Features
- Chinese myth theme
- Infinite Runner Game
- Jump over haystacks, waterfalls and more
- Attack the enemies to keep your friends safe

This is a student project made for an assignment

Game and Art:
K.N.

Music credits:  
"A Very Happy Christmas" by Michael Ramir C

Sound effect credits:   
From https://www.zapsplat.com
